SAIYA_Defend.NAME: Block
SAIYA_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ki-Enhanced( !M! ): Gain an extra 2 Block.

EnergyBlast.NAME: Energy Blast
EnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Ki-Enhanced( !M! ) deal 2 more damage. NL Starter.

PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Yell REALLY loud in order to gain !M! Ki and !B! block.

KameHameHa.NAME: Kame Hame Ha
KameHameHa.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Finisher: Costs 1 less energy per Combo stack.

CCCapsule.NAME: C.C. Capsule
CCCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Get a random Ethereal Power, it costs 1 less Energy until played. NL Exhaust.

KaioKen.NAME: KaioKen
KaioKen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki, apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.
KaioKen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki, apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself.

Endure.NAME: Endure
Endure.DESCRIPTION: Consume ALL your Ki, gain that much block.

BackAttack.NAME: Back Attack
BackAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Telegraphed. NL Finisher: Apply weaken equal to your Combo.

LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Consume ALL your Ki, gain 1 Strength for every !M! Ki consumed. NL Lose ALL Ki Regen. NL Exhaust.

Quickening.NAME: Quickening
Quickening.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki. NL Gain 1 Plated Armor, apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Starter.
Quickening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consumes !M! Ki. NL Gain 2 Plated Armor, apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Starter.

MonkeyTail.NAME: Monkey Tail
MonkeyTail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Put a Full Moon and a Great Ape Form in your draw pile.

FullMoon.NAME: Full Moon
FullMoon.DESCRIPTION: The moon looms ominously in the sky.

GreatApeForm.NAME: Great Ape Form
GreatApeForm.DESCRIPTION: Moonstruck. Gain [E] [E]  at the start of every turn. Exhaust ALL your non-attack cards. Become a Great Ape.

ConcussiveBlow.NAME: Concussive Blow
ConcussiveBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Concussion to the target.

DragonRadar.NAME: Dragon Radar
DragonRadar.DESCRIPTION: Put 7 Dragon Balls in your deck, split between your draw and discard piles. NL Exhaust.

Kienzan.NAME: Kien-zan
Kienzan.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage. This attack ignores block.

DoubleMasenko.NAME: Double Masenko
DoubleMasenko.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage to two different random enemies.

BurningSoul.NAME: Burning Soul
BurningSoul.DESCRIPTION: Consume up to !M! Ki at the end of every turn, gain that much Ki-Barrier.

Scouter.NAME: Scouter
Scouter.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki. NL Gain !B! block this and next turn. NL If the enemy is NOT attacking gain an extra 4 block.

Flurry.NAME: Flurry
Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Ki-Enhanced( !M! ): hit 2 additional times. NL Follow-up.

ThirstForFight.NAME: Thirst for Battle
ThirstForFight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy. NL Exhaust.
ThirstForFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy.

Teleport.NAME: Instant Transfer
Teleport.DESCRIPTION: Consumes !M! Ki. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Starter & Follow-up.

DrainingStrike.NAME: Draining Strike
DrainingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E]  for each enemy hit with unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.
DrainingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E]  for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Give an enemy !M! Strength, gain 1 Reflect.

KiExplosion.NAME: Ki Explosion
KiExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Consumes 10 Ki. NL Gain !B! block and !M! Ki-Barrier.

SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki. NL Stun an enemy for 1 turn.
SolarFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consumes !M! Ki. NL Stun All enemies for 1 turn.

SenzuBean.NAME: Senzu Bean
SenzuBean.DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy Revenge: Strength( !M! ), Invincible(33% of Max HP)
SenzuBean.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy Revenge: Strength( !M! ), Metallicize( !M! x3 ).

GenkiDama.NAME: Genki Dama
GenkiDama.DESCRIPTION: Consume up to !M! Ki and deal that much damage to all enemies. NL Gain 2 Weakened.
